body.p: Notifications can be added to Builds. They can be sent via email, to HipChat, or through FlowDocks.

ol.li: Select the target build and click Edit.
Scroll down and click New Target.

Specify the information for the notification.
Notification Target Name
Type
HTTP post
HipChat
Flowdock
HTTP Endpoint or HipChat Room Number
Token (optional)
Select the target build and click Edit.
Scroll down and click the notification.
Change the information for the notification.
